titles: Som sober inspections made into those ingredients that went to the composition of a late cordial, call'd A cordial for the Cavaliers for the satisfaction of som, who mis-apprehended the author.
author: Howell, James, 1594?-1666.
Howell, James, 1594?-1666. Cordial for the Cavaliers.
notes: A reply to Sir Roger L'Estrange's A caveat to the Cavaliers.
Includes (p. 10-14) the text of "A cordial for the Cavaliers" signed: J.H.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: L'Estrange, Roger, --  Sir, 1616-1704. --  Caveat to the Cavaliers.
